title: Can I get the option to opt out of playing with premades?
body:
1) Premade teams are more toxic than soloqueue players.

2) Your MMR algorithm does a poor job of matching comparably skilled teams containing premade team mates.

3) Thanks for shushing the issue under the rug by modifying your API to prevent 3rd party software vendors from identifying premade team mates.

replies.body: it is not soloque, its solo/duoque, these statistics come out of your ass, and you need to git gud.

Premade teams can be just as dank as regular and you wouldn't know unless they told you they were premade 

MMR algorithm doesn't account for amounts of calcium skeletons have and therefore is always going to be unreliable

"It is not soloque, its solo/duoque, these statistics come out of your ass, and you need to git gud." - Macromite 2015
It'll never happen. We can only dream....
